alert.note: Alert for Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 10:34PM EDT until May 03 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... North Branch Rancocas Creek At Pemberton affecting Burlington County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Branch Rancocas Creek At Pemberton. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 2.5 feet, Some minor flooding begins in Eastampton along Rustic, Peninsula, and Paducah Roads. Lee Street, Joe Road, and Jill Court in Southampton also begin to flood. At 3.5 feet, Lee Street, Joe Road, and Jill Court in Southampton are subject to evacuations. Old Georges Lane, Rancocas Trail in the Ewansville section of Southampton are also flooded as is Mae Avenue. The flooding in Eastampton spreads to West Railroad Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 2.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 2.7 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage later Tuesday or Tuesday night. - Flood stage is 2.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 2.7 feet on 12/15/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (8 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Stg Time Date North Branch Ran Pemberton 2.5 2.4 Sun 10 p 2.7 2.5 2.7 8pm 5/01 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon by 1200 PM EDT.
